New article published

Nov 5, 2022

New article

I just sent to publication an article about how social stratification and cognitive approaches to archaeological interpretation differ in their methods, approach, structural assumptions and even in their concrete results in improving real knowledge about the past.

Audio interface

Nov 5, 2022

Audio Interface arrived.

After a time planning, I now have the audio interface to use with my microphone and to better record and edit the Podcast Episodes. At the same time I am also working on a new theme music, to use on some other projects.
